protein.specific_function: Required for mitochondrial cytochrome c oxidase (COX) assembly and respiration. Binds copper. May be involved in copper trafficking and distribution to COX and SOD1

reference.reference_text: Bechtel S, Rosenfelder H, Duda A, Schmidt CP, Ernst U, Wellenreuther R, Mehrle A, Schuster C, Bahr A, Blocker H, Heubner D, Hoerlein A, Michel G, Wedler H, Kohrer K, Ottenwalder B, Poustka A, Wiemann S, Schupp I: The full-ORF clone resource of the German cDNA Consortium. BMC Genomics. 2007 Oct 31;8:399.
